channel.title: Need help with this error
channel.description: runls: [java] Login Server starting up... [java] Connected to MySQL [java] LoginEngine now running [java] Registering world: 3 [java] 4 [java] 5 [java] 6 [java] 7 [java] 8 [java] 9 [java] 10 [java] 11 [java] 12 [java] 13 [java] 14 [java] 15 [java] 16 [java] 17 [java] 18 [java] 19 [java] 20 [java] 21 [java] 22 [java] 23 [java] Class: org.rsc.CLIENT.MUDCLIENT-W3B5 Player: Bank [java] SQL Exception Loading Bank: Unknown column 'u.sub_expires' in 'field list': 'SELECT r.*, u.username AS owner_username, u.group_id as gid, u.sub_expi res as subexp FROM `rsca2_players` AS r INNER JOIN `users` AS u ON u.id=r.owner WHERE `user`='103204'' [java] Added Bank to world 3 then it says removing bank from world 3 and keeps repeating

item.title: Need help with this error
item.dc:creator: @Kryptix Kryptix
item.description:
@Kryptix wrote:

[quote=“Crooks, post:2, topic:437543”]Add u.sub_expires into user table.

Btw your name is th4don. Are you Hixk? I remember he was going under the nick The_Don or something but that might not be you hehe just curious though.[/quote]
Hixk is smarter than that.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with this error
item.dc:creator: @th4don th4don
item.description:
@th4don wrote:

no im not hixk. i tried adding it few times not to sure what im doing wrong.
are you willing to assist me on teamview?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with this error
item.dc:creator: @Crooks Crooks
item.description:
@Crooks wrote:

Add u.sub_expires into user table.

Btw your name is th4don. Are you Hixk? I remember he was going under the nick The_Don or something but that might not be you hehe just curious though.

item.description:

res as subexp FROM rsca2_players AS r INNER JOIN users AS u ON u.id=r.owner
WHERE user=‘103204’’
[java] Added Bank to world 3
then it says removing bank from world 3 and keeps repeating
